I found this site (in French) that mentions notable heroes/ warriors of
Japan, and among them, they list Kondo. The interesting detail, however, it
s the picture of an sculpure/bust of Kondo beside the note about him.  

Here it is

http://samourais.free.fr/S_Guerriers.html

Firuze
